content:
Hi there! For PSET 1,  I got a 0% on parts A & B and a 50% on part C according to the autograder. However, the autograder shows that my code produced the same output as what should be correct. I went to office hours and it seems that the issue is I defined the variable to be "month" instead of "months." When I run my code in Spyder, I get no errors and get the correct output.

Would it be possible for my grade to be revised?

Thank you so much for your help!
subject: Autograder 20% grade on PSET 1 even though passed test cases

content: If you got a 0 on any part of the pset it will be manually graded by a TA. In the future, please make sure you read the pset instructions carefully to avoid errors like this!
